newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: POLL-Singapore June non-oil exports seen firm.
newsitem.headline: POLL-Singapore June non-oil exports seen firm.

text.p: Singapore's non-oil exports for June are expected to be 6.3 percent higher year-on-year, a Reuters poll of economists revealed on Wednesday.
The conomists said they saw this as a flat reading of the economy, however, as the previous year's base level was considered low.

The 12 financial institutions polled produced an average of 6.3 percent growth year-on-year in nominal terms, but many said the number was deceptively high as it was still lower than the prior month's figures in absolute dollar terms.
